message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the value of the product. However, I'm still committed to getting you the best possible deal. I'm willing to come down to $950,000, reflecting the unique benefits it offers to your business.  This is a significant concession, and I believe it's a fair price considering the potential it holds for you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not convinced that $950,000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $875,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence and I understand your position.  However,  $875,000 is still quite a bit below what this product is truly worth.  Let's split the difference and I'll come down to $925,000.  This reflects both the market value and the unique benefits this product offers to your business, ensuring it's a valuable investment for you. Let's work together to finalize this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not convinced that $925,000 is the right price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it will bring to my business.

Bob, I understand we're getting closer, but $850,000 simply doesn't reflect the true value of this product, especially considering the benefits it brings to your business.  Let's find a middle ground.  I'm willing to come down to $900,000.  This is a fair price that acknowledges both the market value and the unique potential this product offers you. I'm confident it will be a profitable investment for you.
